text: Allakh nisposlal luchshiy rasskaz - knigu s skhodnymi, povtoryayemymi chastyami, ot kotoroy s"yezhivayetsya kozha tekh, kotoryye boyatsya svoyego Gospoda, zatem smyagchayetsya ikh kozha i serdtsa k upominaniyu Allakha. Eto - put' Allakha, vedet On im, kogo pozhelayet, a kogo sbivayet Allakh, tomu net voditelya
